hackathon-description-text: The On Deck Cup is a nationwide hackathon competition designed to unite developers, designers, technologists and anyone else passionate about sports and technology in a series of events aimed at developing innovative new technologies focusedon sports.
hackathon-eligibility: On Deck Cup is open to anyone. To be legally eligible to win a prize, participants must be legal residents, 14 or older, of the 50 United States (including the District of Columbia).
hackathon-requirements:
To officially enter an On Deck Cup regional hackathon sign up on Eventbrite via our

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Paid trip to San Francisco to present your project at On Deck West Conference on October 22nd at the SF Jazz Center.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=154 Grand Street, New York, NY 10013, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
1. Potential positive impact of project to deepen our ability to understand, analyze or enjoy sports

2. Implementation of the project, including its user experience and design

3. Technical difficulty of project

4. Creativity and originality of project

hackathon-location-address: 154 Grand Street, New York, NY 10013, USA
hackathon-description-header: Innovative projects that improve how we follow, analyze and enjoy sports!
